statements: UPDATE ethical_frameworks SET theme = 'Equality', collaborator = 'Government' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE ethical_frameworks SET collaborator = 'Bob', description = 'A detailed framework for promoting accountability and transparency' WHERE theme = 'Accountability';
UPDATE ethical_frameworks SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
